Articles.Content: Ok, then let's just make our own, RAMMING SPEED!

Wait, are you serious!? There's no way your hull will stand up to theirs! We need to head further up than them and examine the data before they arrive at the Citadel! ...Are you listening to me!?

**Shuttle is hit by tractor beam**

Erg... Hey! Vincent, what happened?

Our shuttle was stopped by a tractor beam from the Krynn vessel

Well, charge up the Gigahelix drive and get us out of here!

We are unable to create a stable compression field. Our shuttle and the Krynn's ship's integrity has become extralinked.

I got you, targeting point of beam, got it! Firing! Closing air-tight compartments. Collision imminent! BRACE FOR IMPACT! \*ship collides nose first into the port side of the Krynn ship, severely damaging its hull and electrical systems\*

- - - Updated - - -

\*coughs\* Well, that could have gone better! Xannari, how are you holding up?

D-D-Dam-Damage to-Damage to p-primary sys-systems. Extralinked hull in-integrity has damaged u-us as well.

Is the tractor beam still there?

Af-A-Aff-Afferm-A-Afferma-**Silence** 

...Alright, looks like we still have power for velocity transport.

**Loads dissolution pulse sidearm, and loads the sword**

Vincent, if you can still hear me, get the shuttle, and Sampa's vessel to retract closer to the Citadel. File a damage report while your at it. I'm going in!
Negative...I'm going into the vessel to activate their self-destruct

...

Wow. ... It's gonna take weeks to study this thing thoroughly. Better start scanning...

Let's see here... Fusive waveguide power distribution, collection nodes aren't centered throughout the ship. That means this thing can really take a beating before it becomes inoperable...
Can you find the self-destruct mechanism?
I do-'t -hi-k they ---ld ha-- -n- -cti---y vis--le, if a- ---; -ot on - ves--- o- this so--is--c-ti-n.
Xannari, Come in! I am having trouble picking your connection up! please repeat!
- -a-'t --ar -o **Silence**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

\*dismayed grunt\* Stay there, I'm on my way!

\*after ten minutes of aimlessly searching the ship, I finally locate Xannari\*

Xannari, are you ok?

**Sitting on the floor**

...
is, something wrong?

Don't... Come... Closer...

Infection...
Look, since we are a team, I want you to get to the med-lab on my ship...what's left of it...wait a minute... "you smell that?"

**Turn head slowly, and stares directly at him, revealing a solid, dark red iris and skin degradation**

They know you're here...

Leave... Or they'll get you to...
Go! Get yourself to safety. You...the fake you, saved my life. It's MY turn to return the favor. If I'm not back in 10 minutes, get the ship out of here and on its way back to the Citadel.

...

Losing... The fight...

Control...

Vincent...

...

...

Get him out...

I--- No--- Sto---- Wh--- [End of Transmission]

(What did I miss?)

- - - Updated - - -

(Static) 

This is Laythe. Anyone receiving?

\*Takes a med-kit and put Xannari unconcious, then grabs her and drops her off at the ship entrance\* You'll thank me later... \*takes Xannari's side arm and moves deeper into the enemy ship\*

\*Xannari wakes seconds later\*

[We have encountered the Krynn, a very technologically advanced species with defenses impervious to everything we've tried Except ramming. What use that was

I'm currently infected with a mutant T-cell, slowly morphing my physiology to be one of theirs, also giving me mental organic interlink nodes with every other life form on the ship]
(I gotta go walk the dogs and then go to bed, so I'll be getting off for the night)

I managed to rig up a portable Kraken Drive, and used it to get to the Citadel. I detected your engine signatures here and returned. I then accessed to the Multiverse and shut down all electrical systems in the area. That's probably why they used biological weapons.

Hope... Is lost...

The fight... Lost...

I... Am... Nuax...
We need to find the cure!
